title: Pecan date cake with lemon drizzle
ingredients: ['200g stoned dried dates, chopped', '30g unsalted butter', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '250ml boiling water', '140g light muscovado sugar', '2 eggs', '180g plain flour', '100g wholemeal flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons mixed spice', '1 pinch of salt', '110g pecans, chopped', '100g icing sugar, sifted', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
